#summary OSID Service Bus Wiki - home page

= Introduction =

Welcome to the OSID Service Bus wiki site.  Please use these pages to document ideas, suggestions, diagrams, etc. relating to the idea of a service bus based on OSIDs.  In addition to being language independent, [Requirements requirements] include support for messages, transactions, discovery, and federation.  The [Architecture architecture] addressed the following goals. 

= Goals =

 * Provide general purpose access to educational services.
 * Demonstrate the power and flexibility of the V3 OSIDs
 * Create a framework that enables cross-language interoperability
 * Provide a platform to build new and useful applications
 * Leverage the work of other organizations and standards
